page.title: 07HOUSING IN PULBOROUGH
page.content: There are 3 main types of housing in Pulborough;timber,brick or stone of pre_Victorian days,Victorian to pre-war and Modern.Most modern housing is estate built on land recently owned by the Church (Glebelands). A team of 18 men built their own houses pooling their skills.Each man worked 26 hours/week.Each house took 2070 hours to build.The 18 houses were completed in 18 months. MY HOUSE My house is an old house.When you turn the tap on it sounds as if it is gushing on the floor.My house is made out of a battle ship.Just think a person could have died on that beam.There is a mark on the beam it is the date of the house 1714.There is a little secret passage leading from our loft to next door's loft. (Martyn).
